main.name: Shrikanth P S
main.occupation: ReactJS Developer at Techchefs- A virtusa company
main.description: Worked on INTUIT Quick Books Self Employed, ACCENTURE Life Sciences Hub and much more
main.bio: My name is Shrikanth, I'm a ReactJS Developer. I'm currently working at Techchefs for Intuit QuickBooks. I have extensive experience in building front end projects.

resume.skillmessage: Here's what I have worked on. This list is surely getting longer!

work.title: Sr. Software Engineer
description: - Worked on the Subscribe/ Resubscribe for 'Quick Books Self- Employed( QBSE)' using React Hooks, Apollo client, etc.
- Built multiple workflow pages such as Upgrade, Downgrade and Switch to Quick Books Online (QBO).
- Created re-usable sku selector util page.
- Handled the Payment page and its functionality for QBO.
- Wrote Unit Test cases for the code to ensure production ready code using Jest & Enzyme.
- Built a React-Redux module to view the segmentation of the users and perform various tasks on the same.
- Worked on building Resiliant UI and error handling and providing Degraded experience to the user.
- Build a analytic tracking util to track user actions, clicks and behaviour

work.title: Software Engineer
description: - Built a Front end Application to view and navigate Life science research data for a Pharmaceutical client using HTML, CSS and Javascript.
- Built Python automation scripts to reduce manual effort.
- Monitoring Application performance, Browsing and Analysing Data.
- Automation to automate the user management process.
- Performing Pre & Post patching activities and working to keep the Application Online.
- Resolving Bugs, Issues, Upgrading systems, applying hot fixes and other changes.
- Document/Process systems security groups and user accounts for active directory.

skills.name: Apollo Hooks , Redux, React Context API

projects.title: Cropper- Image Cropper and uploader
projects.category: Took that takes in images of 1024 X 1024 and provides custom and default crops.

testimonials.text: Fantastic work and delivered well. Keep up the good work.
Creative, hardworking and a humble down to the earth person. One would be lucky to have him in his/her team.
